title: Oral history interview with Richard F. Smith [Sound Recording 01]
creator: Richard F. Smith
description: An audio recording of an interview conducted by Charles Digregorio interviewing Richard F. Smith where he discusses his invovlement in the forestry industry in Oregon and other states.
subject: Workers; Foresters; Forestry Schools and Education
source: Oral history interview with Richard F. Smith - The Oregon Historical Society
rightsnotes: Copyright for this interview is held by the Oregon Historical Society
citation: "Oral history interview with Richard F. Smith [Sound Recording 01]," Richard F. Smith. 1978, Oregon Historical Society. Library, Oregon. The Oregon Historical Society, Oral history interview with Richard F. Smith, https://digitalcollections.ohs.org/oral-history-interview-with-richard-f-smith-sound-recording-01

title: OSU Forestry Students Participating in a Sawing Event at the Annual Spring Thaw
creator: Harriet's Photographs
description: A depiction of students at OSU sawing at the Annual Spring Thaw event which was an event sponsored by the OSU Forestry Club.
subject: Forests and forestry—Equipment and supplies; Forestry Schools and Education
source: OSU Special Collections & Archives Research Center - Oregon Digital
citation: "OSU Forestry Students Participating in a Sawing Event at the Annual Spring Thaw," Harriet's Photographs. 1963, Oregon Digital, Oregon. Oregon Digital, Harriet's Photograph Collection, 1868-1996 (P HC), https://www.oregondigital.org/concern/images/df719k92z

title: Postcard: Railroad Car with Logs at the Portland Lumber Company Landing
creator: Gerald W. Williams
description: The front of a postcard depicting four men in overalls standing on a railroad log car in a forest railroad track, they stand alongside logs the same size as the men.
subject: Workers; Foresters; Postcard; Logging railroads; Railroad trains; logging
source: OSU Special Collections & Archives Research Center - Oregon Digital
citation: "Postcard: Railroad Car with Logs at the Portland Lumber Company Landing," Gerald W. Williams. 1908, Oregon Digital, Oregon. Oregon Digital, Gerald W. Williams Regional Albums (P 303), https://oregondigital.org/concern/generics/df66x7324

title: Working with Seed Separation Equipment Img. 2

title: Working with Seed Separation Equipment Img. 3
creator: OSC News Bureau Photo
